verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
No <S%H551>doubt<s%> but ye are the <S%H5971>people<s%>, And <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> shall die with <S%H4191>you<s%>.
But <S%H1571><s%> I have <S%H3824>understanding<s%> as well as <S%H5307>you<s%>; I am not inferior to <S%H3644>you<s%>: Yea, who knoweth not such things as these?

I am as one that is a <S%H7814>laughing-stock<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, I who <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H433>God<s%>, and he <S%H6030>answered<s%>: The <S%H6662>just<s%>, the <S%H8549>perfect<s%> man is a <S%H7814>laughing-stock<s%>.

In the <S%H6248>thought<s%> of him that is at <S%H7600>ease<s%> there is <S%H3940>contempt<s%> for <S%H937>misfortune<s%>; It is <S%H3559>ready<s%> for them whose <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4571>slippeth<s%>.

The <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H7703>robbers<s%> <S%H7951>prosper<s%>, And they that <S%H7264>provoke<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> are <S%H987>secure<s%>; Into whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> bringeth <S%H935>abundantly<s%>.
But <S%H199><s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> now the <S%H929>beasts<s%>, and they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H5775>thee<s%>; And the birds of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and they shall tell <S%H5046>thee<s%>:
Or <S%H7878>speak<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and it shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H1709>thee<s%>; And the fishes of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall declare unto <S%H5608>thee<s%>.
Who <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> not in all <S%H3027>these<s%>, That the hand of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath wrought <S%H6213>this<s%>,
In whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> is the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of every living <S%H2416>thing<s%>, And the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of all <S%H376>mankind<s%>?
Doth not the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H974>try<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%>, Even as the <S%H2441>palate<s%> <S%H2938>tasteth<s%> its <S%H400>food<s%>?
With <S%H3453>aged<s%> men is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, And in <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%>.
With God is <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1369>might<s%>; He hath <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%>.
Behold <S%H2040><s%>, he breaketh down, and it cannot be built <S%H1129>again<s%>; He shutteth <S%H5462>up<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, and there can be no <S%H6605>opening<s%>.
Behold <S%H6113><s%>, he withholdeth the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and they dry <S%H3001>up<s%>; <S%H7971>Again<s%>, he sendeth them out, and they <S%H2015>overturn<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
With him is <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H8454>wisdom<s%>; The <S%H7683>deceived<s%> and the deceiver are <S%H7686>his<s%>.
He <S%H3212>leadeth<s%> <S%H3289>counsellors<s%> away <S%H7758>stripped<s%>, And <S%H8199>judges<s%> maketh he <S%H1984>fools<s%>.
He <S%H6605>looseth<s%> the <S%H4148>bond<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%>, And he <S%H631>bindeth<s%> their <S%H4975>loins<s%> with a <S%H232>girdle<s%>.
He <S%H3212>leadeth<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> away <S%H7758>stripped<s%>, And <S%H5557>overthroweth<s%> the <S%H386>mighty<s%>.
He <S%H5493>removeth<s%> the <S%H8193>speech<s%> of the <S%H539>trusty<s%>, And taketh <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H2940>understanding<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%>.
He <S%H8210>poureth<s%> <S%H937>contempt<s%> upon <S%H5081>princes<s%>, And <S%H7503>looseth<s%> the <S%H4206>belt<s%> of the <S%H4206>strong<s%>.
He <S%H1540>uncovereth<s%> deep <S%H6013>things<s%> out of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, And bringeth <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H216>light<s%> the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>.
He <S%H7679>increaseth<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and he <S%H6>destroyeth<s%> <S%H7849>them<s%>: He enlargeth the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and he leadeth them <S%H5148>captive<s%>.

He taketh <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H3820>understanding<s%> from the <S%H7218>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And causeth them to <S%H8582>wander<s%> in a <S%H8414>wilderness<s%> where there is no <S%H1870>way<s%>.
They <S%H4959>grope<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark<s%> without <S%H216>light<s%>; And he maketh them to <S%H8582>stagger<s%> like a drunken <S%H7910>man<s%>.
